name: Cannon Bob
description:
Help our friend Bob to get as high in the sky as he can using the cannons and find out what is waiting him at the end*. Aim well, bounce on the walls and avoid all the obstacles.

*Just kidding, there is nothing at the end. There's no even an end. Bob is just a weirdo and loves to be shot off.

Graphic part of the game is handmade, using clay, fabrics, cotton... And one button (yay!).

How to play:

Just click on the screen and the game will start. When Bob is inside a cannon, click the screen to shoot him.
